targets.rawSql: SELECT version FROM v_version LIMIT 50
SELECT created_at FROM v_version LIMIT 50
SELECT up_time FROM v_version LIMIT 50
SELECT loss_before, loss_after, window_time FROM v_validator_eval_info WHERE vali_uid = '${vali_uid}' ORDER BY window_time DESC LIMIT 5000
SELECT loss_improvement, window_time FROM v_validator_eval_info WHERE vali_uid = '${vali_uid}' ORDER BY window_time DESC LIMIT 5000
SELECT loss_random_before, loss_random_after, window_time FROM v_validator_eval_info WHERE vali_uid = '${vali_uid}' ORDER BY window_time DESC LIMIT 5000
SELECT loss_random_improvement, window_time FROM v_validator_eval_info WHERE vali_uid = '${vali_uid}' ORDER BY window_time DESC LIMIT 5000
SELECT window_time, global_step FROM v_window_info LIMIT 5000
SELECT window_time, bad_miners_count FROM v_active_miners ORDER BY window_time DESC LIMIT 5000
SELECT window_time, active_miners_count FROM v_active_miners ORDER BY window_time DESC LIMIT 5000
SELECT window_time, gradients_count FROM v_gradients ORDER BY window_time DESC LIMIT 5000
SELECT window_time, diff_miners_count FROM v_active_miners ORDER BY window_time DESC LIMIT 5000
SELECT window_time, learning_rate FROM v_window_info LIMIT 5000
SELECT window_time, eval_uids FROM v_validator_eval_info WHERE vali_uid = '${vali_uid}' ORDER BY window_time LIMIT 5000
SELECT window_number, sync_window_number, avg_window_duration, blocks_per_window, gradient_retention FROM v_overview LIMIT 50
SELECT gather_miners FROM v_overview LIMIT 50
SELECT diff_miners FROM v_overview LIMIT 50

SELECT   'UID' || miner_id::TEXT miner_id, sum(score) score , window_time 
FROM tbl_eval_info_detail aa
JOIN tbl_window_info bb ON aa.window_id = bb.id
JOIN tbl_version cc ON bb.id >= cc.window_id and cc.is_running = true
WHERE 'V'||aa.vali_id::TEXT = '${vali_uid}'
GROUP BY window_time, miner_id  HAVING sum(score) > 0

SELECT   'UID' || miner_id::TEXT miner_id, sum(moving_avg_score) score , window_time 
FROM tbl_eval_info_detail aa
JOIN tbl_window_info bb ON aa.window_id = bb.id
JOIN tbl_version cc ON bb.id >= cc.window_id and cc.is_running = true
WHERE 'V'||aa.vali_id::TEXT = '${vali_uid}'
GROUP BY window_time, miner_id HAVING sum(moving_avg_score) > 0;
SELECT miner_id, moving_avg_score FROM v_eval_info_detail_current WHERE (moving_avg_score > 0 AND vali_uid = '${vali_uid}') LIMIT 500

SELECT   'UID' || miner_id::TEXT miner_id, sum(weight) score , window_time 
FROM tbl_eval_info_detail aa
JOIN tbl_window_info bb ON aa.window_id = bb.id
JOIN tbl_version cc ON bb.id >= cc.window_id and cc.is_running = true
WHERE 'V'||aa.vali_id::TEXT = '${vali_uid}'
GROUP BY window_time, miner_id  HAVING sum(weight) > 0;
SELECT miner_id, weight FROM v_eval_info_detail_current WHERE (moving_avg_score > 0 AND vali_uid = '${vali_uid}') LIMIT 500

list.definition: select 'V'||uid::TEXT uid from tbl_neuron where type = 'true';
list.label: Validator
list.name: vali_uid
list.query: select 'V'||uid::TEXT uid from tbl_neuron where type = 'true';
